DOC.brief_summary: MR saline peritoneography could be useful to demonstrate the peritoneal outline of the pouch of Douglas. The investigators think that the localization of the rectal tumor in function of this anatomic mark could be decisive for pre-operative assessment.
DOC.brief_title: Interest of Saline MR Peritoneography for Pre-operative Assessment of Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Rectal adenocarcinoma Metastatic disease under 18y patient woman of childbearing age
